metadata.title: CVE-2014-9889 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: drivers/media/platform/msm/camera_v2/pproc/cpp/msm_cpp.c in the Qualcommcomponents in Android before 2016-08-05 on Nexus 5 devices does notvalidate CPP frame messages, which allows attackers to gain privileges viaa crafted application, aka Android internal bug 28803645 and Qualcomminternal bug CR674712.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
